verses.name: Jeremiah 36:23
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when Jehudi had read three or four leaves, he cut it with the penknife, and cast it into the fire that was on the hearth, until all the roll was consumed in the fire that was on the hearth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:24
verses.text: Yet they were not afraid, nor rent their garments, neither the king, nor any of his servants that heard all these words.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:25
verses.text: Nevertheless Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah had made intercession to the king that he would not burn the roll: but he would not hear them.
